name: The Bizarre Creations of Keith the Magnificent
description: A point and click adventure about the mad wizard Keith, and his quest to create zombie cyborg friends to come to his parties so he won't be lonely!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A bit tricky at times but nothing beats the feel of completing the hard ones and then get to laugh about the result. Fun and entertaining! A lot of funny details.
